title: Ability to "View DOM" in dev tools
body:
It was possible to View DOM in IE10. Then this functionality has disappeared in IE11 and is not present in Edge. With the async nature of the web these days I need to view a full (as it stand right now - in a given moment in time) on a regular basis.
I don't want to find element and then keep expanding various divs and spans. I'd like to get the whole DOM as text.
Great for security analysis too.

comments.body: you mean, right-click inspect element or the DOM explorer do not work for you in the F12 tools?
